error.signature: TS2433: A namespace-style import cannot be called or constructed, and will cause a failure at runtime

verdict.summary: Namespace imports (* as X) cannot be called as functions. Use default or named imports instead.

dead_ends.action: Use allowSyntheticDefaultImports without understanding the module type
dead_ends.why_fails: Only helps with CJS modules that have a default export; doesn't fix true namespace-only modules

workarounds.action: Use default import or named imports instead of namespace import
Enable esModuleInterop for CommonJS module compatibility

leads_to.condition: When changing import style reveals esModuleInterop issues

preceded_by.condition: When module augmentation changes namespace semantics

frequently_confused_with.distinction: TS1259 is about default import compatibility; namespace merge error is about namespace imports being called as functions
